short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Polaroid Madness is a small program that allows you to add all kinds of Polaroid effects to your images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effects include:
Single Photo Collage 
Big Picture 
Hanging Polaroids 
Stack of Polaroids 
Droste Effect 
Vintage Polaroid Effect (1)
Vintage Polaroid Effect (2)
